programme.title: Live: CFL Football
programme.desc: The East semifinal in the CFL playoffs sees a rematch between the Alouettes (10-8) and Blue Bombers (10-8). The two met in the regular-season finale, with Winnipeg besting Montreal 19-10 for the Bombers' second win over the Als in as many 2025 games.

programme.title: Live: CFL Football
programme.desc: The Lions host the Stampeders in the West Division semifinals. Both clubs ended the regular season at 11-7, with BC winning both games versus Calgary to secure home-field advantage in this contest. The winner advances to play Saskatchewan on Nov. 8.

programme.desc: Whitecaps FC look to eliminate FC Dallas in Game 2 of their West first-round MLS Cup playoff series. Legendary German striker Thomas Müller scored from the spot in the second half as Vancouver rolled to a 3-0 victory over Dallas in Game 1.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Texans host the Broncos. Denver won a fifth straight game in Week 8 behind four TD passes from Bo Nix, and three scores from rookie RJ Harvey. DeMeco Ryans earned a win over his previous employer as Houston dumped San Francisco 26-15.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Jaguars return from their annual London pilgrimage to face the Raiders. Both clubs are back from their bye after losing in Week 7. Travis Hunter (JAX) piled up career highs of eight grabs and 101 yards, and scored his first TD in England.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.desc: The Raptors try to scare up a surprise win in this trip to play the Cavaliers. Cleveland has won the past five meetings with Toronto. Evan Mobley (CLE) averaged 18 points and 11.5 rebounds across a four-game season-series sweep in 2024-25.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of one of the day's best matchups, with a sea of fans cheering wildly in the background, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit and Desmond Howard talk college football for three hours, reporting on the top teams, games, players and storylines. David Pollack and Maria Taylor contribute reports, interviews and features. Davis replaced longtime host Chris F

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 9 Commodores (7-1, 3-1 SEC) visit the No. 20 Longhorns (6-2, 3-1). Texas defeated Vanderbilt 27-24 in 2024 in the first meeting since 1928. Vandy hung on for a 17-10 victory last week as a Hail Mary pass by Missouri came up one yard short.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Jaguars return from their annual London pilgrimage to face the Raiders. Both clubs are back from their bye after losing in Week 7. Travis Hunter (JAX) piled up career highs of eight grabs and 101 yards, and scored his first TD in England.
